data.name: rtb_MainSql.Text
data.value: --正式员工 审批通过 2021年指入职日期 WITH dicEG AS (SELECT DISTINCT DicParent.D_Name, DicChild.D_ID FROM PSAData..RRA_Dictionary DicParent LEFT JOIN PSAData..RRA_Dictionary DicChild ON DicParent.D_UID = DicChild.D_ParentUID WHERE DicParent.D_Type = 'EmpGroup' AND DicParent.D_ParentUID IS NULL AND DicParent.D_Name = '正式员工'), dicStudy AS (SELECT D_Name, D_UID, D_ID FROM PSAData..RRA_Dictionary WHERE D_Type = 'StudyAge' AND D_Name IN ( '博士研究生', '硕士研究生', '大学本科', '大专/高职', '无证书' )), origin AS (SELECT TOP 100 Detail.EAD_ID, org.AreaName, --dicStudy.D_Name AS StudyAge, CASE WHEN DATEPART(DAY, GETDATE()) - DATEPART(DAY, emp.emp_Workday) > 0 THEN DATEDIFF(MONTH, emp.emp_Workday, GETDATE()) / 12 ELSE (DATEDIFF(MONTH, emp.emp_Workday, GETDATE()) - 1) / 12 END AS WorkYear, Detail.EAD_RealSalary, Offer.EO_SalePSYearBonusPer, EDA.* FROM dbo.EDA_EntryInfo EDA LEFT JOIN dbo.EDA_EnterApplyDetail Detail ON Detail.EI_ID = EDA.EI_ID CROSS APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.EDA_ElectronicOffer WHERE EDA_ElectronicOffer.EO_EI_ID = EDA.EI_ID ORDER BY EO_ApproveFinishedDate ) Offer LEFT JOIN PSAData..mng_Employee emp ON emp.emp_EmployeeNo = EDA.EI_EmployeeNo --INNER JOIN dicEG -- ON dicEG.D_ID = Detail.EAD_EmployeeSubGroup --INNER JOIN dicStudy -- ON dicStudy.D_UID = Detail.EAD_StudyAge LEFT JOIN PSAData..mng_DeptOrganizationRelation org ON org.HRDeptID = EDA.EI_EnterDeptID WHERE 1 = 1 --AND EDA.EI_Status = 2 AND DATEPART(YEAR, EDA.EI_EnterDate) = 2021) SELECT origin.EAD_ID, origin.EI_ID, origin.AreaName, --origin.StudyAge, CASE WHEN CAST(origin.WorkYear AS VARCHAR(3)) > 12 THEN '12年以上' ELSE CAST(origin.WorkYear AS VARCHAR(3)) END AS WorkYear, origin.EAD_RealSalary, origin.EO_SalePSYearBonusPer FROM origin;
